Operation 'getSeatmapFromOrder' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is acceptable but could be more action-oriented. Description is completely missing, which severely impacts AI agent interpretability. Added context about required inputs (order ID), expected outputs (seat map collection with specific details), and use case to help agents understand when to invoke this operation.

data.current_summary: Returns all the seat maps of a given order.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve seat maps for an order
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all available seat maps for flights in a given order. Requires the order ID as input. Returns a collection of seat map objects containing seat availability, pricing, amenities, and cabin configuration for each flight segment. Useful for displaying seat selection options to passengers after booking confirmation.
data.reasoning: Original summary is acceptable but could be more action-oriented. Description is completely missing, which severely impacts AI agent interpretability. Added context about required inputs (order ID), expected outputs (seat map collection with specific details), and use case to help agents understand when to invoke this operation.

message: Operation 'getSeatmapFromFlightOffer' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is acceptable but could be more action-oriented. Description is completely missing, creating poor AI agent interpretability. Added details about request body expectations (flight offer object), response structure (seat map collection with specific attributes), and operational context (use during shopping/booking phase). Clarified the distinction from the order-based endpoint to help agents choose the correct operation.

data.current_summary: Returns all the seat maps of a given flightOffer.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve seat maps for a flight offer
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all available seat maps for a given flight offer. Accepts a flight offer object in the request body containing flight details. Returns a collection of seat map objects with seat availability, pricing, amenities, travel class information, and aircraft configuration. Enables seat selection during the flight shopping and booking process before purchase confirmation.
data.reasoning: Original summary is acceptable but could be more action-oriented. Description is completely missing, creating poor AI agent interpretability.
